methods.label: Direction
methods.comment: The direction for alternative sorting. This is ignored unless &quot;column&quot; query parameter is passed as well. This requires the list to be designed for indexing on this column in the desired direction. Defaults to ascending if column is set. Options are &quot;asc&quot; for ascending or &quot;desc&quot; for descending.

methods.label: Keys
methods.comment: Useful for categorized or sorted lists. Limits return values to entries matching the key or keys. Use multiple key parameter items to specify multiple keys in request URL. The keys specified must be in the same order as the sorted columns from left to right. Unsorted columns will be ignored.
methods.signature: Property Get Keys As String Array
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Useful for categorized or sorted lists. methods.label: Scope
methods.comment: What shall the view return. Options: &quot;document&quot; for document entries, &quot;categories&quot; for category names, or &quot;all&quot; for everything.

methods.label: Start
methods.comment: at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0
methods.inlinecomment: ' at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0

methods.label: StartKey
methods.comment: Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.

methods.label: StartsWith
methods.comment: A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.
methods.inlinecomment: ' A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.

methods.label: UnreadOnly
methods.comment: Retrieve only unread entries. Cannot be combined with documents=true, documentsOnly=true, or methods to select or query documents

methods.label: UntilKey
methods.comment: Key value to stop traversal when used in combination with startKey. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup and represents the first value to not return

The default if unspecified is mime.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: The format RichText fields will be returned when retrieving documents instead of view entries. The default if unspecified is mime.
methods.inlinecomment: ' The format RichText fields will be returned when retrieving documents instead of view entries. The default if unspecified is mime.

methods.label: Scope
methods.comment: What shall the view return. Options: &quot;document&quot; for document entries, &quot;categories&quot; for category names, or &quot;all&quot; for everything.
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>What shall the view return. Options: &quot;document&quot; for document entries, &quot;categories&quot; for category names, or &quot;all&quot; for everything.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: What shall the view return. Options: &quot;document&quot; for document entries, &quot;categories&quot; for category names, or &quot;all&quot; for everything.
methods.inlinecomment: ' What shall the view return. Options: &quot;document&quot; for document entries, &quot;categories&quot; for category names, or &quot;all&quot; for everything.

methods.label: Start
methods.comment: at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0
methods.inlinecomment: ' at which entry should return values start (zero based), default = 0

methods.label: StartKey
methods.comment: Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Key value for the first entry to retrieve. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup.

methods.label: StartsWith
methods.comment: A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.
methods.inlinecomment: ' A character combination to perform a partial match to identify a starting point. The character combination will be applied to the &quot;column&quot; and &quot;direction&quot; passed in the query string. This cannot be combined with the &quot;keys&quot; parameter, i.e. you cannot filter on keys and startwith within that key.

methods.label: UnreadOnly
methods.comment: Retrieve only unread entries. Cannot be combined with documents=true, documentsOnly=true, or methods to select or query documents
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Retrieve only unread entries. Cannot be combined with documents=true, documentsOnly=true, or methods to select or query documents</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

methods.inlinecomment: ' Retrieve only unread entries. Cannot be combined with documents=true, documentsOnly=true, or methods to select or query documents

methods.label: UntilKey
methods.comment: Key value to stop traversal when used in combination with startKey. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup and represents the first value to not return
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Key value to stop traversal when used in combination with startKey. This is treated as a greater-than-or-equal lookup and represents the first value to not return</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
